response.overview: 'here is a short clip i did last year, using footage that i shot during the 2012 olympic games. At first it was supposed to be part of a very long video (8h+) ; but then i decided to extract it as an autonomous part.  Not much to say here, i'm using a song from the band Au Bordel, one of Noel Akchoté' many projects.  the title is the same as Calaferte' book, but it has to be taken as its litteral meaning (well, you can try to find a relation with Calaferte' book but it was no intentional)).'
response.title: La mécanique des femmes
